Location: Brienz (Bern province) ; Bern, Luzern, Schwyz, Uri, Obwalden provinces
River Basin: Danub and tributaries: Isar, Enns, Inn

Location: Bern, Graubunden, Ticino, Uri, Valais provinces
Basel, Zurich, Lucerne, Schwyz and Uri Cantons
Origin: Torrential rainfall caused by a slow-moving area of low pressure – named “Bernd”
Geo Locations: Basel-landschaft, Basel-stadt, Luzern, Schwyz, Uri, Zurich (Adm1).
